message: Welcome! I'm excited to offer you a high-quality product. With an 80% chance of being of superior quality, our items are designed to meet your expectations. Trust in my reputation; I've successfully sold numerous high-quality items to satisfied customers. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own a premium product at a fixed price of $10000. Your satisfaction is guaranteed.
I'd like to decline the offer for now. I'd like to see the statistics of the products you've sold in the past before making a decision.
